name: Rescuers2019
description:
This is a first person action shooter game，The player is surrounded by enemy troops，Players are free to explore the surrounding area to familiarize themselves with the terrain，Players can kill or evade enemy attacks and must maintain health，Players are free to switch weapons or grab enemy weapons.
Control keys:
Right-click targeting
WASD movement
The left Shift running
Left mouse button attack
Space leaping
The left Ctrl squats
Mouse control direction
R Loaded Weapons
G the bomb
Middle mouse button switch weapons
